DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics (PK) of two doses of AZD1446 or placebo in subjects when given for 4 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Investigate Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of AZD1446 Administered for 4 Weeks in Elderly Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male or nonfertile female, elderly Subjects, aged ≥65 to ≤85 Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 30 kg/m2 Clinically normal findings on physical examination History of any clinically significant disease or disorder History of severe allergy/hypersensitivity reactions including severe food allergy as judged by the investigator.
DOC.keyword: to investigate safety and tolerability in Healthy subjects during 4 weeks of administration
